languages.text: {n}Маражай щелкает языком.{/n} "Может быть, уже что-нибудь взорвете или как-то иначе развеете томность беседы? Эта тяга мон-кай к изнурительным мирным переговорам пробуждает во мне желание сократить количество наших... собеседников." {n}Пристальный взгляд ксеноса заставляет Йегер побледнеть.{/n} "Всего на один дерзкий язык меньше — и мы свободны. Разве не заманчиво?"

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Взорвите уже что-нибудь — эта тяга мон-кай к изнурительным мирным переговорам пробуждает во мне желание сократить количество наших... собеседников. {n}Пристальное внимание ксеноса заставляет Йегер побледнеть.{/n} "Всего на один дерзкий язык меньше — и мы свободны. Разве не заманчиво?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tsks in exasperation.{/n} "Would you be so obliging as to finally blow something up or otherwise enliven this tedious conversation? The propensity of the mon-keigh for these protracted and futile efforts to avoid violence is enough to make me wonder if I should... cut down the number of negotiating parties." {n}The Drukhari's stare causes Yeager to turn pale.{/n} "One brazen tongue removed — and we are free. Does that not sound tempting?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай щелкает языком.{/n} "Может быть, уже что-нибудь взорвете или как-то иначе развеете томность беседы? Эта тяга мон-кай к изнурительным мирным переговорам пробуждает во мне желание сократить количество наших... собеседников." {n}Пристальный взгляд ксеноса заставляет Йегер побледнеть.{/n} "Всего на один дерзкий язык меньше — и мы свободны. Разве не заманчиво?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt aufgebracht mit der Zunge.{/n} "Würdet Ihr freundlicherweise endlich etwas in die Luft sprengen oder dieses ermüdende Gespräch anderweitig auflockern? Der Hang der Chem-Pan-Sey zu langwierigen und sinnlosen Bemühungen, Gewalt zu vermeiden, lässt mich grübeln, ob ich nicht ... die Anzahl der beteiligten Parteien verringern sollte." {n}Der starre Blick des Drukhari lässt Yeager erblassen.{/n} "Eine vorwitzige Zunge entfernt – und wir sind frei. Klingt das nicht verlockend?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tsks in exasperation.{/n} "Would you be so obliging as to finally blow something up or otherwise enliven this tedious conversation? The propensity of the mon-keigh for these protracted and futile efforts to avoid violence is enough to make me wonder if I should... cut down the number of negotiating parties." {n}The Drukhari's stare causes Yeager to turn pale.{/n} "One brazen tongue removed — and we are free. Does that not sound tempting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt aufgebracht mit der Zunge.{/n} "Würdet Ihr freundlicherweise endlich etwas in die Luft sprengen oder dieses ermüdende Gespräch anderweitig auflockern? Der Hang der Chem-Pan-Sey zu langwierigen und sinnlosen Bemühungen, Gewalt zu vermeiden, lässt mich grübeln, ob ich nicht ... die Anzahl der beteiligten Parteien verringern sollte." {n}Der starre Blick des Drukhari lässt Yeager erblassen.{/n} "Eine vorwitzige Zunge entfernt – und wir sind frei. Klingt das nicht verlockend?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai émet un sifflement d'exaspération.{/n} « Auriez-vous l'obligeance de bien vouloir faire exploser quelque chose, ou au moins tenter de redonner un peu de souffle à cette assommante conversation ? La propension des mon-keigh à déployer des efforts aussi prolongés que futiles dans le but d'éviter le recours à la violence me pousse à me demander si je ne devrais pas... réduire le nombre de participants de cette négociation. » {n}Yeager pâlit sous le regard insistant du Drukhari.{/n}« Il suffirait de trancher une langue bien pendue... et nous serions libres. Vous ne trouvez pas cette idée tentante ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tsks in exasperation.{/n} "Would you be so obliging as to finally blow something up or otherwise enliven this tedious conversation? The propensity of the mon-keigh for these protracted and futile efforts to avoid violence is enough to make me wonder if I should... cut down the number of negotiating parties." {n}The Drukhari's stare causes Yeager to turn pale.{/n} "One brazen tongue removed — and we are free. Does that not sound tempting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai émet un sifflement d'exaspération.{/n} « Auriez-vous l'obligeance de bien vouloir faire exploser quelque chose, ou au moins tenter de redonner un peu de souffle à cette assommante conversation ? La propension des mon-keigh à déployer des efforts aussi prolongés que futiles dans le but d'éviter le recours à la violence me pousse à me demander si je ne devrais pas... réduire le nombre de participants de cette négociation. » {n}Yeager pâlit sous le regard insistant du Drukhari.{/n}« Il suffirait de trancher une langue bien pendue... et nous serions libres. Vous ne trouvez pas cette idée tentante ? »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋恼怒地啧了啧舌。{/n}“这场谈话实在是太无聊了，不如听我的话，炸些什么东西，或者做些别的什么，活跃一下气氛吧？猴子热衷于漫长的交谈，总想通过这种徒劳的手段来避免暴力。我不禁在想，我是不是应该……减少一下谈判各方的人数？”{n}在玛拉斋的凝视之下，耶格尔的脸色变得苍白。{/n}“只要割掉这条乱说话的舌头，所有的麻烦都会消失。这是个诱人的提议，你不觉得吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tsks in exasperation.{/n} "Would you be so obliging as to finally blow something up or otherwise enliven this tedious conversation? The propensity of the mon-keigh for these protracted and futile efforts to avoid violence is enough to make me wonder if I should... cut down the number of negotiating parties." {n}The Drukhari's stare causes Yeager to turn pale.{/n} "One brazen tongue removed — and we are free. Does that not sound tempting?"

{n}玛拉斋恼怒地啧了啧舌。{/n}“这场谈话实在是太无聊了，不如你炸些什么东西，或者做些别的什么，活跃一下气氛吧？猴子热衷于漫长的交谈，总想通过这种徒劳的手段来避免暴力。我不禁在想，我是不是应该……减少一下谈判各方的人数？”{n}在玛拉斋的凝视之下，耶格尔的脸色变得苍白。{/n}“只要割掉这条乱说话的舌头，所有的麻烦都会消失。这是个诱人的提议，你不觉得吗？”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai chista, exasperado.{/n} «¿Podrías hacerme el favor de reventar algo o hacer otra cosa para animar esta tediosa conversación de una vez? La inclinación de los mon-keigh por estos esfuerzos prolongados e inútiles de evitar la violencia basta para que me pregunte si debería... reducir el número de participantes». {n}La mirada del Drukhari hace palidecer a Yeager.{/n} «Cortamos una lengua osada y somos libres. ¿No es tentador?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tsks in exasperation.{/n} "Would you be so obliging as to finally blow something up or otherwise enliven this tedious conversation? The propensity of the mon-keigh for these protracted and futile efforts to avoid violence is enough to make me wonder if I should... cut down the number of negotiating parties." {n}The Drukhari's stare causes Yeager to turn pale.{/n} "One brazen tongue removed — and we are free. Does that not sound tempting?"

La inclinación de los mon-keigh por estos esfuerzos prolongados e inútiles de evitar la violencia basta para que me pregunte si debería... reducir el número de participantes». {n}La mirada del Drukhari hace palidecer a Yeager.{/n} «Cortamos una lengua osada y somos libres. ¿No es tentador?».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはあきれ顔で舌打ちした。{/n}「いい加減、何かを爆破するか、この退屈な会話に刺激を与えちゃくれないか？モン＝ケイどもの、こうも長引く無意味な暴力回避の努力には辟易するぜ。交渉相手の数を減らしてやろうかと思うほどだ」{n}デュカーリの鋭い視線に、イェーガーは青ざめた。{/n}「一人の大胆な口を封じれば、俺たちは自由になれる。魅力的な提案だろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tsks in exasperation.{/n} "Would you be so obliging as to finally blow something up or otherwise enliven this tedious conversation? The propensity of the mon-keigh for these protracted and futile efforts to avoid violence is enough to make me wonder if I should... cut down the number of negotiating parties." {n}The Drukhari's stare causes Yeager to turn pale.{/n} "One brazen tongue removed — and we are free. Does that not sound tempting?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, bıkkınlıkla cıklıyor.{/n} "Bir şeyi patlatabilir ya da bu sıkıcı sohbeti canlandırabilir misiniz? Mon-keighlerin şiddetten kaçınmak için bu uzayan ve nafile çabalara olan eğilimi, 'Acaba müzakereci tarafların sayısını azaltmalı mıyım?' diye düşündürüyor beni." {n}Drukhari'nin bakışları, Yeager'ın rengini solduruyor.{/n} "Bir küstah dili sustursak özgürüz. Kulağa cazip gelmiyor mu?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tsks in exasperation.{/n} "Would you be so obliging as to finally blow something up or otherwise enliven this tedious conversation? The propensity of the mon-keigh for these protracted and futile efforts to avoid violence is enough to make me wonder if I should... cut down the number of negotiating parties." {n}The Drukhari's stare causes Yeager to turn pale.{/n} "One brazen tongue removed — and we are free. Does that not sound tempting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai bıkkınlıkla tıs tıs eder. {/n} "Bir şeyi patlatabilir ya da bu sıkıcı sohbeti canlandırabilir misiniz? Mon-keighlerin şiddetten kaçınmak için bu uzayan ve nafile çabalara olan eğilimi, 'Acaba müzakereci tarafların sayısını azaltmalı mıyım?' diye düşündürüyor beni." {n}Drukhari'nin bakışları, Yeager'ın rengini solduruyor.{/n} "Bir küstah dili sustursak özgürüz. Kulağa cazip gelmiyor mu?"
